original_text: The king was very angry with the first servant. He told his men to put him in prison. They punished the servant there very much, until he could pay all his debt to the king.’
korean_text: 주인이 노하여 그 빚을 다 갚도록 그를 옥졸들에게 넘기니라

sentences.original_text: The king was very angry with the first servant.
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 첫 번째 종에게 매우 화가 났습니다.

sentences.original_text: He told his men to put him in prison.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 사람들에게 그를 감옥에 넣도록 명령했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They punished the servant there very much.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그곳에서 종을 매우 심하게 벌했습니다.

sentences.original_text: until he could pay all his debt to the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 왕에게 모든 빚을 갚을 때까지입니다.
